descriptionHtml:
===========================================================================================
============Read this for Double Axes Of Skyrim Standalone 2.0____Update______06.december.2012
===========================================================================================
Mod is updated to the latest 1.8 update or later

i have fixed some blood issues on axes, so now they are working properly.

download the

1.DoubleAxesStandalone 2.0  or you can download a replacer or bouth

2.DoubleAxesStandalone 2.0 replacer
  replaces the next battle axes

-daedric
-draugr------(not yet in standalone version)
-dwarven-----(not yet in standalone version)
-ebony
-elven
-glass
-iron
-nordhero
-orcish------(not yet in standalone)

and then just put the data folder to your main skyrim folder  where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

no need to uninstall previous versions

===========================================================================================
===========================================================================================

What this mod does:
====================

Import the new battle Double Axes

1.Ebony Double Axe_________1st axe added on 28.12.2011)____Ebony section to forge
2.Executioner Double Axe___2nd axe added on 29.12.2011)____Iron section to forge
3.Viking Double Axe________3rd axe added on 30.12.2011)____Steel section
4.Elven Double Axe_________4th axe added on 30.12.2011)____Elven section
5.Falmer Double Axe________5th axe added on 30.12.2011)____Daeedric section
6.Skull double Axe_________6th axe added on 31.12.2011)____Iron Section 
========================Update============================================================
7.Glass Double Axe_________7th axe added on 08.01.2012)____Glass Section 
8.Iron Double Axe__________8th axe added on 08.01.2012)____Iron Section
9.Daedric Double Axe_______9th axe added on 08.01.2012)____Daedric Section
10.Nord Hero Double Axe____10th axe added on 08.01.2012)____Misc Section

more will be added soon.

                              Installation:
======================================================================================
1. go to **(your user name)**\\Documents and Settings\\My Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

open the SkyrimPrefs.ini with the notepad
and put this line under the [Launcher] section

bEnableFileSelection=1

2.Unpack the mod to a known location like (Desktop).

3.Find the folder labeled \'Data\' within the mods files.

Copy data folder to your Skyrim main folder where the TESV.exe is

When prompted by Windows if you would like to overwrite files with the same name
in the data folder located there answer, \"Yes To All\".

4.Start up Skyrim , and place a checkmark next to  Double Axes Standalone.esp
in your Data files.

5.Visit a smith and forge Axes under the coresponded section of the Axe material section 


Double Axes can be forged by all smiths 

Un-Installation Instructions:
===============================

Remove the checkmark from   Double Axes Standalone.esp in the
data files at start of the Skyrim launcher

If you would also like to remove the files

delate the folder  DoubleAxes   from the   data\\meshes\\weapons
and the folder     DoubleAxes   from the   data\\textures\\weapons
and the file Double Axes Standalone.esp from the data folder



Permision:
==============================================================
i just do a little tweaking with the meshes and textures
and import the Axes in the Skyrim.

You can do what ever you want with all of this.

Credits:
=========
Bethesda for The Sxyrim game

Tools Used:
==============
Adobe Photoshop
NifSkope


===================================================================================
                                Credits: Skull Double axe
====================================================================================
nicoroshi    who made axe   Charon\'s Call Axe
http://planetelderscrolls.gamespy.com/View.php?view=OblivionMods.Detail&id=104519&id=3486
====================================================================================
                              Permission: Skull Double axe 
====================================================================================
No permission from me nedded also ne credits, becouse i didnt make the axe
just retexture and imported it to Skyrim.

but if you use any of the file or texture from these mod you must credit the autor
of the axe Nicoroshi
======================================================================================

======================================================================================
              Permissions from the autor of the mod Nicoroshi Creations, nicoroshi
======================================================================================
                                      quote
=======================================================================================
It is O.K. to re-release this mod in it\'s original form 
should I become unreachable.

It is also O.K. to use the meshes, textures, and icons as a modders resource 
so long as credit is given for my original work.
=====================================================================================
Tesvsnip
